Services.name: Simple
Services.description: glimpses journal offers simple & intuitive interface which render it easy to start with.

Services.name: Secure
Services.description: Data is stored in your personal Dropbox cloud, which is encrypted by default. And there are no glimpses servers in the chain.

Services.name: Focus
Services.description: A distraction-free writing mode that focuses just on your words.

Services.name: Organized
Services.description: Organize your journal entries with tags & re-discover the past with calendar.

Services.name: Dropbox
Services.description: All your glimpses journal entries will be stored and in sync with your Dropbox account..

Services.name: Native
Services.description: glimpses journal is built natively for the Windows.
